title: Rate of work done by motor accelerating block

content.prompt:
A 10 kg block is attached to a light cord that is wrapped around the pulley of an electric motor,
as shown above. At what rate is the motor doing work when it is pulling the block upward with an instantaneous speed of 3 m/s and an upward acceleration of 2 m/s2 ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
